messages.subject: Give yourselves a hand...re unschooling music
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks guys for helping me let go with this. My ds has been taking piano for 3 years and has been off and on resistant.  We have kept him at it because he
messages.messageBody:
Thanks guys for helping me let go with this.

My ds has been taking piano for 3 years and has been off and on
resistant. We have kept him at it because he enjoys playing but can
be easily frustrated with a new piece. He has a natural talent that
I enjoy (proud mama that I am) but I don't want him to hate it. His
Dad and I talked with him about his lessons and he is deciding if he
wants to continue. We explained our reasons (some admittedly selfish)
and stressed our love. However it works out, we are proud of his
accomplishments (which can never be taken away) and support his
choice.

Keep up the "pressure" gang! We are getting there!!
Beth Anne
